snippet: On the first anniversary of the uprising against Bashar al-Assad, hacked emails reportedly from the accounts of Syria's first couple reveal ruthlessness, intrigue and a taste for online shopping.
abstract: On the first anniversary of the uprising against Bashar al-Assad, hacked emails reportedly from the accounts of Syria's first couple reveal ruthlessness, intrigue and a taste for online shopping.

headline.main: Assad Couple Fiddles While Syria Burns
